analysis.key_quote: I reject the idea that our “representatives” are pushing through bullshit laws like this in order to scapegoat their own incompetence on civil servants helping YOUR constituents and veterans.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the proposed rule, criticizing representatives for scapegoating civil servants and indicating a concern about the politicization of civil service. The emotional language and condemnation of the rule suggest a clear stance against it.
